title: Wizard

your Intelligence modifier Spell Attack Modifier: your Proficiency bonus + your Intelligence modifier Known Spells: 1 + your Intelligence modifier + your Wizard level Spell List: Prepared Casters - Can change equiped spells freely when out of combat. UNIQUE CLASS FEATURES

Wizard Spells Arcane Recovery: Replenish spell slots while out of combat. You cannot restore spell slots above 5th level.
